entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 1:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Drizzle. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to freezing rain this evening then to drizzle near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.summary: Drizzle ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
